original_text: At that time, the Lord will call the soldiers of Egypt to come and attack you. And they will come like a crowd of flies! He will call for soldiers to come from Assyria. And they will come like a crowd of bees!
korean_text: 그 날에는 여호와께서 애굽 하수에서 먼 곳의 파리와 앗수르 땅의 벌을 부르시리니

sentences.original_text: the Lord will call the soldiers of Egypt
And they will come like a crowd of flies!
He will call for soldiers to come from Assyria
And they will come like a crowd of bees!
